title: The California Butcher
description: A troubled schoolteacher stumbles upon a fetish website and begins a journey of pleasure and madness. In this modern-day version of Sacramento, deeply flawed people search for love while a serial killer stalks the State of California. A new psychological thriller from one of the newest voices in horror. This psychological thriller from Stephen Rhoades delivers a terrifying and dark novel that will linger in your mind long after you put the book down.
author: Stephen  Rhoades
